Kegiatan.title: Kegiatan
Kegiatan.description: Represents an activity retrieved from Google Calendar.

googleCalendarId.description: ID of the event in Google Calendar.

namaKegiatan.description: Name or title of the activity.

tempat.description: Location where the activity takes place.

definition.description: Stores kegiatan (activity) data synced from Google Calendar.

params.name: kegiatanId
params.description: The unique identifier of the activity.

firestore.reasoning: The Firestore structure is simplified to only include the 'Kegiatan' entity, which is the core data model currently used in the application, sourced from Google Calendar. All other unused entities and complex relationships have been removed to clean up the project.
